alpitiya amugoda jayasumanarama purana maha wiharaya thalagaspe jayawardhanaramaya katandola bodhirajaramaya ha kiridola ingalahene aaranya senasuna yana chathur wiharadhipathi, amarapura siri saddhamma wansha maha nikaye, eknaligoda wihara parshawaye galu palathe pradhana sanghanayaka mahopadhyaya, kawishwara, aacharya, amugoda somarathana nahimiyange anushasana paridi, wiharadhikari, dakshina lankawe upa pradhana sanghanayaka shasthrapathi, amugoda somananda nahimiyan athulu dayaka karakadinge sanwidhanayen laksha 45 ka dhanawyayen thayilanthaye bankok nuwara kaptan pramok na ubol mathithuma athulu gnyathin wisin thama demapiyan wana abhawapraptha karnal chalech seyingaram, thenmuwan seyingaram depala sihi kirim was amugoda jayasumanarama purana maha wiharaye idikota athi 2600 shri sambuddhathwa jayanthi demahal sima mandiraya mema masa 23 dina perawaru 10.15 ta shri lanka amarapura maha sangha sabhawe uththarithara maha nayaka rajakiya panditha, daiwi bhasha wisharada agga maha panditha dawuldena gnyanissarabhidhana mahanahimi, shri lanka amarapura maha sangha sabhawe sabhapathi, agga maha panditha kotugoda dhammawasa anu nahimi, mahopadhyaya panditha kuruwita saranankara maha nahimi, mahopadhyaya gaurawa shasthrawedi kosgoda saranankara mahanahimi, shri lanka sambuddha shasanodaya sangha sabhawe maha nayaka shasthrapathi waskaduwe mahindawansha mahanahimi, pradhana garuthara maha sangharathnaye sahabhagithwayen saha benthara alpitiya shri.lan.ni.pa. pradhana sanwidhayika githa samanmali kumarasinha mathiniyage arayumen agramathya di.mu. jayarathna mathithuma athin uthsawashriyen wiwrutha kirimata niyamithaya.edina warshika katina maha pinkama sidukerena athara buddha prathima wahansela puja kirima sandaha wishesha thayi dutha pirisak da, sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya.

me mathaya thamayi pasukalaye bedumwadi prachandathwaya widiyata mathuwanne. 1951 di eelankeyi thamil arasu kochchi pakshaya bihiwanne demala janaya sandaha wenama rajyayak godanangimatayi.
